hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah:While delivering a sermon, Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If anyone of you comes while the Imam is delivering the sermon or has come out for it, he should offer a two rak`at prayer

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّطَوُّعِ مَثْنَى مَثْنَى
chapter.eng-name: What is recited in the two Rak'a (Sunna) of the Fajr
